phases.name: Fix Image Display
phases.description: Locate the HTML page with flight statistics and fix the missing image

subtasks.description: Locate HTML file containing flight statistics and identify broken image reference

verification.run: Find HTML file with flight stats and locate img/image element in code

subtasks.notes: Located HTML file (./index.html) containing flight statistics visualization. Identified broken image reference: src attribute references './images/flight-stats.jpg' but the actual file is './images/flight-stats.png'. File extension mismatch is causing the image to fail to load. Ready for fix in subtask-1-2.

subtasks.description: Fix image path or restore missing image file to display flight statistics correctly

verification.run: Open HTML page in browser and verify flight statistics image displays with all 50+ countries visible

subtasks.notes: Fixed image path in index.html line 639: Changed src from './images/flight-stats.jpg' to './images/flight-stats.png'. The actual image file in the images directory is flight-stats.png. Image now correctly references the existing PNG file and will display the 50+ countries flight statistics visualization.
